headline: Ralph Lauren Corporation (RL): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Ralph Lauren Corporation on TickerTrends Research’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on RL. Ralph Lauren Corporation’s share was trading at $356.18 as of February 10th. RL’s trailing and forward P/E were 24.23 and 21.83 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Ralph Lauren Corporation designs, markets, and distributes lifestyle products in North America, Europe, Asia, and internationally. RL appears positioned to outperform consens
